title: Journalists will acknowledge the apathetic audience
description: Each semester, I ask my journalism students to take out their phones and share their average daily screentime, their top three apps, and the average daily time spent with those apps. The answers are exactly what you’d expect: An average of five hours a day spent primarily on social media platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and...
